Social media posts with similar captions: indicating the widespread dissemination of the claim.
The lack of credible reports or evidence: 3. A reverse image search using a video verification tool revealed that the footage was not recent and had been previously shared online in May 2018.
Confirmation from the Hawks: an elite police unit in South Africa, verified that the video was recorded during a police operation in May 2018 and showed men being rounded up during the arrest of cash-in-transit suspects.
